name: first_loan_points
title: Will you be paying points to lower your interest rate?
label: Loan Points
description: Tell us how many points you plan to pay.
tips: This information would be provided by your lender on the term sheet attached to the pre-approval letter (if you have one).
small_print: Points are upfront fees paid to lower your interest rate. Each point costs 1% of your loan amount and typically lowers your rate by 0.25%. Consider consulting with your lender about whether paying points makes financial sense for your situation.

internal.notes: Affects closing costs and monthly payment calculations
